MBTA’s new commuter rail fleet far behind schedule

The MBTA’s $190 million order for 75 commuter-rail cars designed to replace part of the aging fleet are at least a year and a half late. (Boston Globe)

Hyde Park residents get
their rightful ZIP code

A section on the neighborhood’s border won a battle with the US Postal Service to establish that they are, in fact, in Hyde Park, not in Mattapan.

Disabled veterans hit the ice

Sled hockey and other sports for the disabled have become popular with wounded veterans, requiring them to think, react, and move in new ways.

Seaport adding innovation center

Mayor Menino will unveil plans for a $5.5 million center in the Seaport District, part of a broader effort to transform the area into a hotbed of entrepreneurship.
boston capital | steven syre

The MBTA’s big debt problem

The MBTA will never break free from an annual cycle of fiscal contortions to balance its books without some commitment to reduce the overall debt.
opinion | Kevin Cullen

Cutting corners at National Grid

Union workers say the company wants to replace them with lower-paid workers with less training and experience, raising its profits while reducing its safety.

A123 to spend $55m to fix batteries

Fixing this latest defect could hurt the Waltham battery maker, which recently had millions of dollars in orders canceled by one of its biggest customers.

The art of self-expression

With help from local service agencies, expressive artists with mental and physical limitations have been able to move beyond their challenges.

Business

Save money on groceries

Although it may not seem like it, food costs are still one of the most flexible areas in most families' budgets. While you may have little control over your mortgage or day care costs, you can probably save money on groceries.

Travel

Budget getaways in New England

Spring is the best in New England for finding travel bargains. Stuck between ski and beach seasons, hotels tend to slash their rates and restaurants start creatively filling up their specials boards.
